intro.description: This cheat sheet will automatically launch wizards, perform actions, and guide you through the individual steps to create a new Service. To learn more about using cheat sheets or to see a list of available cheat sheets click help (?). To start working on this cheat sheet, click the "Click to begin" button below.

item.title: Overview Details
item.description: Description on how to use the overview page.

item.title: Pageflow Page
item.description: Description or introduction on how to use this page to create page flow.

item.title: Managed beans Page
item.description: Description on how to use the "managed beans page" to create, edit and remove a managed bean in JSF.

item.title: Components Page
item.description: Description on how to create, edit and remove a component, renderkit, converter and validator.

item.title: Others Page
item.description: Description on how to manage other elements in the faces config file: action listener, message bundle, locale

item.title: Source Page
item.description: User can edit the source of faces config here.

item.title: Completion
item.description: Congratulations, you should now be able to take further actions.
